H0.text: From which film did the Oscar winning song `Up Where We Belong' come. An Officer and a Gentleman

H1.text: From which film did the Oscar winning song `Up Where We Belong' come. Top Gun

H2.text: From which film did the Oscar winning song `Up Where We Belong' come. Dirty Dancing

H3.text: From which film did the Oscar winning song `Up Where We Belong' come. Zack Mayo

A4.text: The song was recorded by Joe Cocker and Jennifer Warnes for the 1982 film An Officer and a Gentleman.
